name: HipMatch3
description:
Commands:

- W, A, S, D to move

- Enter to select and swap

Background:

This is not meant to be a complete, fully released game, it is but a prototype which could be very easily extended. It was made with Hipreme Engine, which is supporting almost all platforms using the D programming language. 

Credits for cynicmusic.com for the background music

Credits for Melissa Krautheim for the sprites.
